data.text: Ɛnna Suhini Bildad buaa sɛ:
“Wobɛkɔ so aka saa nsɛm yi akɔsi da bɛn?
Onyankopɔn kyea atɛntenenee anaa?
Ɛberɛ a wo mma yɛɛ bɔne tiaa noɔ no,
Nanso sɛ wode wʼani bɛto Onyankopɔn so
sɛ woyɛ kronn, na wotene a,
Wo ahyɛaseɛ bɛyɛ nkakra nkakra
“Bisa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a atwam no,
Na wɔwoo yɛn nkyɛreeɛ na yɛnnim hwee.
Nanso adikanfoɔ no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo.
Paparɔs bɛtumi anyini akɔ soro wɔ baabi a ɛnyɛ ɔwora?
Ɛberɛ a ɛrenyini a wɔntwaeɛ no,
Saa na wɔn a wɔn werɛ firi Onyankopɔn no awieeɛ teɛ;
Biribiara a nʼani da so no nni ahoɔden;
Ɔtwere ne ntontan, nanso ɛtete;
Ɔte sɛ afifideɛ a wɔgugu so nsuo yie a ɛsi owia mu.
Ne nhini nyini fa abotan ho,
Nanso sɛ wɔtu firi ne siberɛ a,
Ampa ara ne nkwa twam,
“Ampa ara Onyankopɔn mpo onipa a ne ho nni asɛm
Ɔbɛma woasere bio,
Wɔde aniwuo bɛfira wɔn a wɔtan woɔ,
